Name: ProofPointTap
Author: Microsoft - support@microsoft.com
Description: The [Cyolo Sentinel Solution](https://cortex-panw.stoplight.io/docs/cortex-xdr/branches/main/09agw06t5dpvw-cortex-xdr-rest-api) data connector allows ingesting logs from the Cyolo Sentinel Solution API into Microsoft Sentinel. The data connector is built on Microsoft Sentinel Codeless Connector Framework (CCF). It uses the Cyolo Sentinel Solution API to fetch agents, alerts, incidents, management and endpoint logs and it supports DCR-based [ingestion time transformations](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/logs/custom-logs-overview) that parses the received security data into a custom table, thus resulting in better performance.
